name: Quran Recitation
intromsg: Hey! Behairy! Do you hear me? I hope you're with me on the line!it's time for quran! you have to get up now and do it! Hey Ahmad. leave everything in your hand right now! it's time for Quran recitation!

name: Learn something new
intromsg: Hey Ahmed!I think its time to go get a cup of coffee. and learn something coool! cause you have to be ahead of your mates!

name: A swim in heaven
intromsg: Don't you wish to swim in heaven? I recently caught a heaven on Earth if you're interested!I think you will like it. It's all about learning more about your relegion!

name: Work
intromsg: I know you have a lot of things to do!but you need to get married!and work is neccesary! Get yourself up!have a coffee!and let's get to work!? Don't you think it's time to leave whatever you're doing and go get some money?

name: Learn programming
intromsg: Hi Ahmad!I'm Pamylka!long time no see!where were you all this time? I was taking such a lot of diverse interesting courses! there're a lot of fantastic stuff out there!come and take a look

name: study
intromsg: Ahmed! I think it's time to study and do some of your assignments now!!
